oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Blair Apartments before and after the razing, Nashville, Tennessee, 1976
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Blair Apartments, located in downtown Nashville at Demonbreun Street and Seventh Avenue S, before and after the razing circa 1976. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 4 photograph negatives : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buildings--Tennessee--Nashville; Apartments--Tennessee--Nashville; Architecture--Tennessee--Nashville
